name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 1, a video of Americans celebrating Halloween with singing and dancing sparked the envy of many Chinese people.
Netizens responded, "This is the people being the masters of their own country."
"Why are there only uniformed ghosts on Halloween in our country?"
"Don't they have to go to work? Don't they have to work overtime?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 31, West Hollywood Halloween Parade

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 31, at the Bell Tower in Xi'an, Dabai was doing nucleic acid testing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 1, the Guangzhou-Zhaoqing Intercity High-Speed Railway's Fuxing train was stranded on the line for more than an hour due to a line fault that caused a power outage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 24, Anyang, Henan. Homeowners of Courtyard No. 6 in Yili Town protested against the lack of heating in the community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 30, Zhengzhou, Henan.
Medical staff at Baisha Health Center hung a banner at the door to demand their salaries and asked their leaders to get out of the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 1, Nanjing. The owners of Mingyue Fenghe went to the Lishui District People's Government to protest the unfinished house.
During the period, a leader came to warn the owners not to post videos randomly
The owner retorted, "Do you have any problems? If there are no problems, why are you afraid of (the people) taking pictures? Why can't you post it?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 1, on Gongbu Street in Harbin, a petitioner who looked like a pregnant woman was carried into a van by several men and abducted on the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the night of November 1, the K7034 train from Heihe to Harbin derailed. There were no casualties in the accident and the cause is under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 2, Shaanxi Electronic Information Vocational and Technical College.
A student was beaten by his roommate. The student next to him said he would call the police, but the teacher scolded him loudly, "Why are you talking so much nonsense?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At 10 pm on November 1, a student protest broke out in a high school in Quanzhou, Fujian.
The school announced that classes would continue as usual on Saturday, which caused dissatisfaction among students. Hundreds of students gathered outside the administrative building to demand a weekend off.
In the end, the school announced that Saturdays would be changed to voluntary self-study at school, and the students celebrated the success of the "uprising".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Street banners in Anfeng Township, Anyang, Henan:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 1, Chongqing. A woman cosplays as a mother of three with dark circles under her eyes.
Netizens responded: "It's Chinese horror indeed" and "I declare this the scariest cosplay for Halloween"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 1, netizens caught spies in the comment area. Question: One sausage costs 3 yuan, how much does two cost?
Another netizen answered: 6 yuan was suspected of being a spy. Because buying one more sausage will save one yuan, that is, 5 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 1, Ganzhou, Jiangxi. A student of Ganzhou Vocational and Technical College was asked to sign a "Internet circumvention commitment" for circumventing the firewall. He promised not to use circumvention software to access banned overseas websites and services, and was willing to bear legal responsibility if he violated the commitment.
